title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Senior DevOps Engineer
   

  

**This** 
**is** 
**Worldline**
 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
   

  

**The O** 
**pportunity**
 We are seeking a versatile Software Engineer to join our Platform Engineering DevOps team, and work in a constantly evolving, dynamic, and agile environment, believing that the route to speed and stability is through automation. Teamwork, communication, and speaking your mind are of high importance to us, especially when they come with a curious mind, a willingness to grow, and exchange ideas and knowledge.
   

  

 In this role, along with a team of 8 members, you’ll set up AWS (Amazon Web Services) infrastructure which is handling millions of transactions worth billions of Euros. The team has a DevSecOps standpoint, owns, develops, and manages all Infrastructure as Code in AWS accounts, running 100s of containers and serverless functions; If you build it, you run it!
   

  

 If this looks exciting and you are eager to continue growing your professional capabilities with ongoing training and educational opportunities, come join us!
   

  

**Day-to-Day Responsibilities**
 Delivering the committed objectives that include adapting to any new needs to reach the goal
   

  

* On-call duty according to a rotating schedule
* Participate in your team's day-to-day activities including tools development, operations, maintenance, and support
* Being an active member in our agile events like daily stand-ups, planning, retros, and demos. etc.
* Foster team spirit, quality and technical agility


**Who Are We Looking For**
 We look for big thinkers. People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. In practice this means:
   

  

 You have proven experience in systems engineering, automating infrastructure creation & maintenance tasks using Docker, Jenkins, Terraform\ CloudFormation, etc.
   

  

* You have a bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, distributed systems, software engineering, or another equivalent field
* You have relevant experience in supporting/operating transaction driven and highly available platforms running microservices with 99.99% uptime
* You have a curiosity about security solutions such as WAF, IDS/IPS, Anti-DDOS, and SIEM
* You have work experience in programming (Python scripting) and an interest in automation
* You are passionate about cloud services, pay attention to details, handle many different partners and you are accountable to deliver results in a fast-paced environment


**Perks & Benefits**
 At Worldline you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
   

  

* Being a part of a company guided by a strong purpose to do good and recognized as top 1% of the most sustainable companies in all sectors worldwide
* Health benefits contribution
* Health check – Every 2nd year
* Pension: BTP1 & BTP2
* Private Health Care Insurance (Euro Accident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.


**Shape the evolution**
 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
   

  

**Learn More About Life At Worldline At Jobs.worldline.com**
 We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.

title: Functional Safety Engineer
description:
Coalesce Management Consultancy (CMC) have a consulting assignment available for a Functional Safety Engineer, to work on a project we have in Stockholm
 



  





 CMC provide expert engineering solutions on an international capacity for Electronic systems and other Advanced Engineering projects. Established in 2016, we set out our mission to be the best service-driven consulting business in global STEM markets, and after rapid growth in just a few years, we’re already delivering true expertise to major technology brands and leading companies around the world.
 



  





 As we expand our reach and take on new projects, we have assignments available for experienced professionals to join our consultancy and deliver the expert solutions and high level of service we’re known for across multiple ventures.
 



  





 By partnering with CMC, you get the chance to work with some of the world’s leading technology specialists. From our global offices we support you with each new project, providing a complete scope of work definition ahead of any engagement, so you know exactly what’s required by the assignment, before you land on-site. As the project is completed, we can continue to work with you by setting up your next project from our global network of leading technology companies.
 



  





  






 Join our latest project
 




  





 We are looking to support one of our project teams with a Functional Safety Engineer, for a project we have taken on.
 



  





 In this position you will be involved in developing both functional and technical safety concepts, evaluating proposed technical solutions with a safety-first mindset, assessing the feasibility of embedded software development and implementation, conducting hazard analyses, performing Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA), applying Fault Tree Analysis (FTA) techniques, and contributing to a wide range of other safety-related activities as required.
 



  





 The main requirements would be:
 



  




* A structured mindset and strong knowledge in FUSA ( Functional Safety).
* Proficient in FMEA ( Failure Mode and Effects Analysis), HARA ( Hazard Analysis and Risk Assessment) and Fault Tree Analysis.
* Ability to create FUSA concepts and documentations.
* Experience with requirement management and the ability to update and improve existing documents.
* A focus on fulfilling requirements through the development process.
* Work comfortable with full stack with C, C++, Python, Bash,Conan,CANalyzer, Canoe,Spark.
* Proficient with MATLAB and Simulink



  





  





 You would be able to operate as an independent consultant for this assignment, which I can support with. you will also be required to go on-site.
 



  





  





 If you have the relevant capability and are interested in pursuing this assignment, talk to our sales consultants today. Harry.Ward@cmcexpertisedelivered.com
 



  






 Get in touch
 




 Learn more about Coalesce Management Consulting, our projects and the support we provide to our consultants at https://expertisedelivered.com
 



  





  





 No terminology in this advert is intended to discriminate on the grounds of age or experience, and we confirm that we are happy to accept applications from persons of any age or experience for this role.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
Bankgirot söker nu en Site Reliability Engineer till en växande del av organisationen i Stockholm. Bankgirot har en unik ställning på Sveriges betalmarknad som nu genomgår den största transformationen i modern tid. Vår IT-organisation är i en tillväxtfas för att utveckla framtidssäkrade lösningar som följer internationell standard och regelverk.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Som Site Reliability Engineer kommer du att spela en viktig roll i uppdraget att säkerställa framtidens betalningsinfrastruktur. Du blir en central del av Bankgirots omfattande transformationsresa och får en nyckelroll i att bygga vår helt nya "Greenfield"-lösning för en framtidssäker betalningsinfrastruktur. Det här är en unik möjlighet för dig som vill vara med från grunden och skapa en modern plattform som formar Sveriges betalflöden.
   

  

 I denna roll får du arbeta med drift och vidareutveckling av PostgreSQL i miljöer med höga krav på tillgänglighet och säkerhet. Du kommer att ha ett helhetsansvar för PostgreSQL som tjänst inom organisationen – från installation och livscykelhantering till säkerhetskopiering, återställning och kontinuerlig förbättring. Du arbetar i nära samverkan med utvecklingsteam och DevOps-team för att säkerställa stabil och compliant tjänsteleverans.
   

  

**Vem är du**
 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

  

* erfarenhet av PostgreSQL utifrån ett driftsperspektiv och är van att arbeta i komplexa tekniska miljöer.
* god kännedom om High Availability-lösningar, klustermiljöer och nätverkskommunikation, inklusive TLS.
* erfarenhet av och är trygg i att arbeta med automatisering med hjälp av Ansible och CI/CD-pipelines.
* teknisk förståelse för hur Kubernetes och meshnätverk kan tillämpas.
* kunskap om härdning av Linuxsystem enligt CIS Benchmarks och har insikt i krav kopplade till tillståndspliktig verksamhet och compliance.
* erfarenhet av att samarbeta med utvecklingsteam och DevOps-team, liksom en nyfikenhet på att bidra till vidareutvecklingen av vår plattform inom ramen för transformationsdriften – den del av verksamheten som ansvarar för nya lösningar fram till dess att de är fullt implementerade.
* relevant akademisk utbildning, eller motsvarande erfarenhet inom området, som ger dig den tekniska bas som krävs för att möta både dagens och framtidens utmaningar.
* goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt.


 Mer information och ansökan
   

  

 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Bankgirot med Nexer Recruit.
   

  

 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta gärna rekryteringskonsult Johanna Värmfors: johanna.varmfors@nexergroup.com eller +46 730 821 230 alternativt Artan Bitiqi: artan.bitiqi@nexergroup.com eller +46 723 61 28 44.
   

  

 Läs mer om tjänsten och ansök här.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Bankgirot är ett svenskt clearinghus och teknikbolag med över 60 års erfarenhet av att leverera finansiell infrastruktur till banker. I samverkan med betalsektorn ser vi till att privatpersoner och företag enkelt kan göra överföringar och betalningar. Bankgirot säkerställer att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar felfritt, samtidigt som vi utvecklar framtidssäkrade lösningar. Vi säkrar och utvecklar Sveriges betalningar.
   

  

 Läs mer på www.bankgirot.se

title: Senior Solution Architect – Drive Strategic Innovation in Data Management & Integration | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is a leading northern European financial services group, and at the same time, one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. Banking is changing rapidly, and we are proud of our reputation for being entrepreneurial and innovative in the face of change. Our brilliant techies work hard to future proof SEB’s digital architecture and customer products because it genuinely makes a huge impact for our customers and colleagues. Does that sound like a fit for you?
   

  

 Are you an experienced architect passionate about data products, event-driven architecture, and scalable integration patterns? Do you know how to balance people, processes, and technology at a strategic level—and thrive in a hands-on role, ensuring consistency in how APIs, Kafka events, and Data Products are designed and implemented? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you!
   

  

 In this role, you’ll drive architecture and transformation, helping divisions and teams adopt a structured approach to integrations such as APIs, Kafka events, and Data Products. You’ll enable teams, define patterns, and ensure our platforms support their needs—creating a more scalable, predictable, and well-governed ecosystem.
   

  

 Your work will shape today’s platform strategy and guide its future evolution, ensuring our methodologies grow alongside new data integration challenges.
   

  

 If you’re excited about working with multi-cloud enterprise architecture while driving alignment across divisions and teams, we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

 We are an enabler domain, providing best-in-class platforms and architecture patterns for APIs, Events, Event Streaming (Kafka), Data Products, Business Intelligence (BI), and Machine Learning.
   

  

**As a Senior Solution Architect, your primary mission is to:**
* Ensure integrations adhere to structured interoperability standards.
* Guide other domains and teams in applying the defined architecture in daily development, acting as a trusted advisor to stakeholders in both Business and Technology.
* Work closely with other architects.
* Coach and mentor solution architects, helping them embed best practices into their designs.
* Be passionate about contract-first thinking in integration patterns.


**What You Bring**
* 5+ years in a senior architecture role.
* Extensive experience in data integrations and integration patterns.
* Strong background in multi-cloud data platforms, with deep expertise in GCP.
* Solid understanding of data governance and lifecycle management within a layered architecture framework.
* Proven ability to coach and mentor solution architects, driving the adoption of best practices.
* Experience with data provisioning and integrating into data governance frameworks.
* A strategic mindset, enabling divisions to adopt integration-first methodologies aligned with platform capabilities.


**Bonus Points For Experience With**
* Previous experience in the financial industry
* Familiarity with Data Mesh concepts and adoption
* Experience in data modeling
* Understanding of ML architecture
* Expertise in integration architecture
* Hands-on experience in data engineering
* Knowledge of DevOps and continuous delivery practices
* Familiarity with authentication protocols such as OpenID Connect (OIDC) and OAuth


 At SEB, We Provide An Empowering And Inclusive Environment Where Your Career Journey Is Uniquely Yours. Here’s What You Can Look Forward To
   

  

* Opportunities to contribute to SEB’s top-priority initiatives.
* A collaborative, friendly, and welcoming culture.
* Diverse, international teams in a global working environment.
* Competitive compensation with exclusive SEB staff banking benefits.
* Agile and modern ways of working.
* A modern hybrid work model and state-of-the-art office spaces.


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 We are looking forward to your application by June 15th, 2025.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position please contact Lars Lindgren, Business Infrastructure, Deputy Domain Architect, lars.lindgren@seb.se.
   

  

*Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.*
**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: DevOps Tech Lead
description:
**About Us** 




  





**At FDJ UNITED, we don't just follow the game, we reinvent it.** 




 FDJ UNITED is one of Europe’s leading betting and gaming operators, with a vast portfolio of iconic brands and a reputation for technological excellence. With more than 5,000 employees and a presence in around fifteen regulated markets, the Group offers a diversified, responsible range of games, both under exclusive rights and open to competition. We set new standards, proving that entertainment and safety can go hand in hand. Here, you’ll work alongside a team of passionate individuals dedicated to delivering the best and safest entertaining experiences for our customers every day.
 



  





 We’re looking for bold people who are eager to succeed and ready to level-up the game. If you thrive on innovation, embrace challenges, and want to make a real impact at all levels, FDJ UNITED is your playing field.
 



**Join us in shaping the future of gaming. Are you ready to LEVEL-UP THE GAME?** 




  





 We are seeking a passionate and innovative DevOps Tech Lead to join our Platform Delivery and Reliability Services (PDRS) team. If you excel in a dynamic and technically demanding environment, we want you on our team!
 



 As a DevOps Tech Lead, you will be solving architectural challenges, planning current and future work, as well as provide insight, communication and leadership. You will be instrumental in leading the development of a fully automated platform by overseeing the design and maintenance of Kubernetes environments as well as managing Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) tools.
 



 You will work closely with the Product Manager of the PDRS team as well as development, operations, QA, and cross-functional teams to ensure smooth application deployment, scaling, and security across our private and public cloud infrastructure.
 



  





 Join us and become part of a team that values innovation, collaboration, and excellence.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Give strategic direction when it comes to design, implementation, and maintenance of CI/CD pipeline tools.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate DevOps practices into the development lifecycle.
* Enhance platform scalability, reliability, and security across cloud and on-premises environments.
* Drive DevOps best practices, fostering a culture of automation, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
* Identify and analyze incidents, develop and implement effective solutions.
* Keep up to date with the latest tools, trends, and technologies, and share knowledge within the team.







**Skills and Experience:** 



* Advanced or expert in all layers of the DevOps work field.
* Deep understanding of containerized applications and container orchestration tools such as Kubernetes, EKS etc.
* Advanced Kubernetes Administration skills.
* Expertise with IaC tools such as Terraform, Ansible, and Kubernetes Operator.
* Strong Linux administration skills.
* Excellent troubleshooting abilities.
* Strong knowledge within programming or scripting languages, such as Python and Groovy.
* Expertise in designing and building reusable CI/CD pipelines using industry-standard tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Bitbucket Pipelines, and TeamCity.
* Experience with private and public cloud technologies, such as VMware/Openstack, and AWS/GCP/Azure.
* Knowledge of registry and asset management tools such as Artifactory.
* Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to foster partnerships and drive cross-functional alignment.
* Ability to clearly express requirements and expectations to a wide range of individuals - and to understand stakeholders' requirements and see how they influence the course of action.
* Identify and define technical solutions with respect to short, middle, and long-term strategies.
* Experience and interest in working with AI and AI tools is a plus.



  





**Our Way Of Working** 




 Our world is hybrid.
 



 A career is not a sprint. It’s a marathon. One of the perks of joining us is that we value you as a person first. Our hybrid world allows you to focus on your goals and responsibilities and lets you self-organise to improve your deliveries and get the work done in your own way.
 



  





**Application Process** 




 We believe talent knows no boundaries. Our hiring process focuses solely on your skills, experience, and potential to contribute to our team. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and evaluate each candidate based on merit, regardless of personal characteristics as the age, gender, origin, religion, sexual orientation, neurodiversity or disability.

title: Backend Engineer I, Security
description:
The Spotify Security team is looking for a talented Software Engineer to join our Product Security area within the Security studio. We’re on a mission to build innovative security products and tools that empower our engineers and keep Spotify secure. If you’re passionate about embedding security into the development lifecycle, love tackling complex challenges at scale, and thrive in a collaborative environment focused on building solutions for engineers, then think no further and apply! Come help us build the next generation of security at Spotify.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Design and develop products, services, and infrastructure to support, strengthen, and drive our technical security strategy.
* Build robust infrastructure and tooling to enhance the security posture across our distributed environment.
* Drive scalability, optimization, and consistency across our security engineering approaches and practices.


 Who You Are
   

  

* 1+ years of with at least one object-oriented programming language, such as Java, Scala, or similar in production environment.
* 1+ years of experience with or interest in modern frontend development, including frameworks like React and languages like TypeScript.
* Basic knowledge or interest in developing and maintaining backend services, focusing on reliability and scalability.
* Solid understanding of system design, data structures, algorithms, and a willingness to improve performance optimization skills.
* Committed to writing clean, maintainable, and testable code.
* Team-oriented, enjoys participating in discussions, solving problems, and engaging in iterative development.
* Curiosity about security principles, including basic concepts of threat modeling and risk management.
* Strong interpersonal skills, able to share ideas clearly and effectively with team members.


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in London or Stockholm.
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home. We ask that you come in 3 times per week.


 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer** 
 in our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 We're currently transforming our AWS infrastructure by moving from our custom container platform to ECS/Fargate. In this role, you'll help evolve our sophisticated infrastructure-as-code foundation that provisions AWS services with different networking patterns, DNS configurations, and security boundaries. Also, you will participating in architecture discussions to determine optimal service patterns.
   

  

 We are hosted in AWS and 100% cloud-native. If you, like us, are a tech-savvy person - you’ll fit right in!
   

  

**Among Other Things, You’ll Be Doing**
* Leading the migration from our custom orchestration to AWS ECS/Fargate
* Designing and implementing networking solutions
* Collaborating with development teams to implement service discovery patterns
* Configuring load balancers for different traffic flows and security boundaries
* Sharing knowledge with team members through pairing sessions and documentation
* Adapting to changing requirements as we evolve our platform architecture
* Helping solve complex production issues alongside your teammates


**What We’re Looking For**
 We believe you are currently working as a Senior Infrastructure Engineer, Senior DevOps Engineer, Senior Platform Engineer or Senior Site Reliability Engineer with relevant experience. Our team values individuals who embrace learning over knowing everything, thrive in collaborative environments, and adapt quickly to changing requirements. This role requires strong technical curiosity and a collaborative mindset as we navigate the complexities of cloud modernization.
   

  

**Successful Candidates Also Meet The Following Requirements**
* Solid problem-solving skills and experience in architecting solutions in AWS
* Programming experience in Node.js
* Strong interest in continuous integration and continuous deployment, automation and other efficient workflow-oriented practices.
* Experience with AWS networking, load balancing, and container orchestration
* Understanding of DNS management and service discovery patterns
* Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code principles.
* Knowledge of Python programming


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: QA Engineer
description:
**Why join us?**
 We’re on a mission to empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. As the world-leader in assistive communication solutions, we empower our customers to express themselves, connect with the world, and live richer lives.
   

  

 At Tobii Dynavox, you can grow your career within a dynamic, global company that has a clear, impactful purpose - with the flexibility to also do what truly matters to you outside of work. What’s more, you’ll be part of a work culture where collaboration is the norm and individuality is welcomed.
   

  

 As a member of our team, you’ll have the power to innovate for good. You’ll see your ideas in use in new applications, work with the latest technology on leading platforms, and deliver meaningful solutions for our customers.
   

  

 We are seeking a skilled, proactive and adaptable
 **QA Engineer** 
 to join our Enterprise IT Engineering team as our first dedicated quality assurance professional, supporting quality assurance across our
 **custom-developed internal systems** 
 as well as
 **Salesforce CRM,** 
 and
 **Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP** 
 platforms. You will play a key role in establishing testing standards and practices while ensuring the quality, reliability, performance, and compliance of business-critical applications and integrations.
   

  

 You will work closely with developers, analysts, and business stakeholders to design test strategies, validate complex workflows, and support high-impact releases.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Test end-to-end workflows that span across Salesforce, D365, and internal platforms.
* Design and execute functional, integration, non-functional and regression test cases to ensure quality, performance, and data integrity.
* Identify opportunities for test automation and implement scalable, reliable coverage by integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines for early and continuous quality feedback.
* Advocate security-aware development through validation of access controls, data handling, and compliance with regulations like GDPR and HIPAA.
* Participate in sprint ceremonies to align test coverage with business and technical requirements, fostering a quality-first mindset through early involvement, close collaboration with developers, shift-left testing practices, mentorship, and quality standards.
* Support User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and lead post-deployment validation activities to ensure production stability and stakeholder confidence.
* Investigate, document, and track defects, conduct root cause analysis, and work closely with development and business teams to ensure timely resolution.
* Monitor and assess the impact of Salesforce and D365 platform updates on existing customizations, workflows, and integrations, ensuring proactive test planning.
* Continuously improve QA practices by analyzing testing outcomes, capturing metrics, and identifying process optimizations for better quality, speed, and collaboration.


**Required Qualifications**
* At least 5 years of QA experience, with a strong understanding of QA methodologies, Agile processes, and SDLC.
* Proven experience with both manual testing and test automation across modern technology stacks.
* Experience establishing QA practices in growing organizations
* A strong grasp of testing strategy, prioritization, risk-based assessments, and quality metrics.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions).
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly articulate test outcomes, risks, and recommendations.
* A collaborative and hands-on mindset with the ability to influence teams toward quality-driven practices.
* A degree in engineering, computer science, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).


**Nice-To-Have**
* Experience or familiarity with testing in .NET / C# and Azure environments. While not a requirement, this would be valuable as many of our applications are built in .NET and run on Azure.
* Experience with Salesforce and D365 testing tools (Provar, Selenium, RSAT or similar)
* A keen eye for detail and the ability to reproduce complex issues reliably.


**Growth Opportunities**
 This role offers a unique opportunity to build quality assurance practices from the ground up, with potential for team leadership as we expand our QA capabilities. You will work across diverse technologies and gain deep expertise in enterprise system integration testing
   

  

 Apply today!
   

  

 We believe in empowering individuals - including our own employees - to reach their full potential. So, if you want to change lives while growing your own career, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
**👨‍💻 Senior Data Engineer – Banking Platform Rebuild** 




**💰 Up to 80,000 SEK + ITP Pension + Benefits** 




**📍 Stockholm / Hybrid (2–3 days per week in-office) at Leading FinTech** 




**🌟 Own the Platform That Powers the Future of Nordic Finance 🌟** 




  





 This is your chance to join a leading FinTech as it enters one of the most exciting chapters in its journey — rebuilding its core data platform from the ground up. You’ll be joining a senior engineering team that is redefining how data is structured, processed and delivered in a high-scale, regulated environment.
 



  





 As a Senior Data Engineer, you’ll have full ownership across the development lifecycle — from architecture through to live production. The systems you help build will have a direct impact on millions of customers across the Nordic region. This is not maintenance work — you’ll be building something entirely new, from first principles.
 



  





**What they’re looking for:** 




  





 ✅ Strong background in building production systems and scalable, cloud-native architecture
 



 ✅ Experience designing high-performance, secure data platforms in complex environments
 



 ✅ A software engineering mindset — with a focus on testing, monitoring, documentation and quality
 



 ✅ Ownership mentality — you've supported systems in production and taken responsibility for their success
 



 ✅ Enjoy working closely with product and business teams to build solutions that support real-time decisions
 



  





**Why join:** 




  





 🌍 Design critical infrastructure for a platform that processes millions in transactions every day
 



 💡 Apply true engineering standards to data — test suites, infrastructure as code and deep observability
 



 🚀 Work in a team of senior engineers who value autonomy, craft and impact
 



 🤝 Collaborate directly with product, data science and business leaders — with real influence and visibility
 



 📈 Build compliant, scalable systems ready for AI — across GDPR, PCI-DSS, PSD2 and more
 



  





 This is not just another data role — it's a career-defining opportunity to help engineer the future of a major banking platform.
 



  





*If you’re ready to take on the challenge, apply today!*

title: Senior Data Engineering
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Data Infrastructure and Analytics, and IT System Data Services
description:
Skala upp din karriär inom Data Analytics!
 



 Har du en passion för datadrivna lösningar och en vilja att göra skillnad? Vi är ett innovativt konsultföretag inom Data Analytics som kombinerar ett team av erfarna experter och ett starkt europeiskt partnernätverk för att skapa mervärde för våra kunders befintliga och framtida lösningar inom Data Analytics.
 



 Vår filosofi bygger på att vara starkare tillsammans och vi är stolta över att erbjuda en miljö där det är tryggt att utmana sig själv och lära av misstag, det är lärande och utveckling som driver oss framåt.
 



  





**Varför Rebtech?** 



* Bli en del av ett erfaret team – Arbeta med några av branschens mest kompetenta experter inom Data Analytics. Hos oss står lärande och kunskapsutbyte i fokus.
* Kultur som prioriterar gemenskap – Hos oss råder en prestigelös atmosfär där laget alltid går före jaget.
* Förmåner utöver det vanliga – Marknadsmässig fast lön, bonus, möjlighet till delägarskap samt generös pensionsavsättning, friskvårdsbidrag och regelbundna teamaktiviteter gör att du både kan växa och trivas på jobbet.



  





**Data Engineer på Rebtech** 




 Som Data Engineer på rebtech har en central roll i att designa, bygga och underhålla kundernas dataplattformar och pipelines. Du vill arbeta brett och hantera hela leveranskedjan – från dataintegration till att skapa värdefulla insikter för kunderna. Rollen ger dig utrymme att vara innovativ och proaktiv i att möta kundernas specifika behov och utmaningar.
 



  





**Du besitter flera av följande egenskaper** 



* Har en problemlösande attityd med förmåga att arbeta självständigt
* Är lösningsorienterad, driven, vill lära och lära ut
* Har fyra eller fler års erfarenhet inom Business Intelligence och Data Warehousing
* Har programmeringskunskaper i ett eller flera språk (Python, Scala, Java eller liknande)
* Har erfarenhet av bygga ETL/ELT-pipelines
* Har erfarenhet Azure och MS FAbric
* Van att arbeta med DevOps: GIT, CI/CD
* Har erfarenhet av containerteknologier och IaC (Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform eller liknande )
* Arbetat med moderna verktyg som Databricks, DBT, Power BI och Airflow
* Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska
* Relevant universitetsexamen



  





**Personliga egenskaper** 



* Analytisk och problemlösningsorienterad.
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* Nyfikenhet och vilja att lära sig nya teknologier.
* God kommunikationsförmåga i både tal och skrift.



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 



* Möjlighet att arbeta med cutting-edge teknologi och spännande projekt.
* En arbetsmiljö som främjar kreativitet och innovation.
* Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och karriärmöjligheter.
* Flexibla arbetsvillkor och bra arbetslivsbalans.



  





**Ansökningsprocess** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Aliby - The Pink Company. Då intervjuer och urval sker löpande ber vi dig att inte vänta med din ansökan. Vid intresse vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Thandi Schüler på thandi.schuler@aliby.se 0730-742503
 







 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Azure-specialist inom säkerhet och infrastruktur
description:
Till vår kund i Solna söker vi efter en Azure-specialist som trivs i en dynamisk och tekniskt avancerad miljö och vill arbeta med moderna molnteknologier. Vår kund utvecklar hållbara lösningar för morgondagens samhälle och industri och verkar inom flera affärsområden, inklusive fastighetsutveckling och förvaltning, entreprenad och service inom industri, bygg och infrastruktur. Med sina innovativa och hållbara lösningar strävar de efter att skapa välmående samhällen och framtida industrilösningar.
   

  

 Tjänsten börjar som ett konsultuppdrag med möjlighet att gå över till kunden efter 6 månader.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 I rollen som Azure-specialist inom säkerhet och infrastruktur kommer du att ha ett stort ansvar för att konfigurera och underhålla Azure-miljön, säkerställa att den är stabil, optimerad och anpassad för verksamhetens behov. Du arbetar med att implementera och optimera Azure-infrastruktur, inklusive hantering av resurser och applikationer. Vidare kommer du att ha ett viktat fokus på säkerhetsaspekter, där du ansvarar för att implementera säkerhetsåtgärder, hantera Microsoft Defender samt analysera loggar för att identifiera och förebygga potentiella hot.
   

  

 En stor del av arbetet handlar också om att effektivisera och automatisera processer. Med hjälp av PowerShell och andra verktyg bygger du lösningar som förbättrar säkerhet och prestanda. Du kommer att hantera och konfigurera Intune för enhetshantering och arbeta med nätverkslösningar i Azure, samtidigt som du felsöker eventuella problem som kan uppstå.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har en gedigen bakgrund inom Microsofts ekosystem, med djupgående kunskap inom Azure, Microsoft Defender och PowerShell. Du har en förståelse för moderna DevOps-principer och hur nätverksinfrastrukturer i molnet är uppbyggda.
   

  

 Som person är du nyfiken och engagerad, med en stark vilja att hålla dig uppdaterad inom nya teknologier och säkerhetslösningar. Du har en god kommunikationsförmåga och trivs med att samarbeta i team, samtidigt som du kan arbeta självständigt och driva projekt framåt.
   

  

**Krav**
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure – Konfiguration och säkerhetshantering i molnmiljöer.
* Kunskap om Microsoft Defender – Implementering och hantering av säkerhetslösningar.
* Erfarenhet av PowerShell – Skriptning och automatisering av processer i Microsoft-miljöer.
* Förståelse för DevOps-principer – Erfarenhet av hur DevOps-tekniker används i praktiken.
* Felsökning av infrastruktur och nätverk – Primärt molnbaserat men även enklare on-prem-lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av Intune – Hantering av klienter och policykonfigurationer.
* Automatiseringserfarenhet – Byggt och implementerat automatiseringar för säkerhetsprocesser.


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Technical Co-Founder & AI Engineer — Brand Intelligence Startup [Equity-based Compensation Opportunity]
description:
**🔥 Brinna AI** 
 —
 **Reimagining the future of Brand Management with an AI Powered Brand Intelligence Platform.** 




  





 Are you a skilled full-stack engineer with a passion for AI? A founder at heart, or do you aspire to become one? Passionate about tackling complex problems through technology? Do you thrive in the 0-to-1 startup phase and want to build something that genuinely adds value for the brands of the world?
 



  





 If so, join
 **Brinna AI** 
 and co-build a company almost from the ground up and own a meaningful stake in a game-changing product.
 



  





***Note:***
*This opportunity is mainly equity-based, with no initial monetary compensation until we secure funding later this year. However, if this is a potential deal-breaker, we can offer a modest cash compensation for the ideal co-founder.* 




  





*This is a full-time hybrid role based in Stockholm.* 




  





**This Is Us** 




  





**Brinna AI** 
 , a promising new Stockholm-based venture, harness the power of AI to revolutionize brand management, ensure consistency and providing valuable insights for brands. As the demand for maintaining brand consistency has surged with the latest advancements in AI, we aim to become the intelligent antidote to brand inconsistencies by being at the forefront of this essential shift of paradigm. Currently, we're working with global brands and have already generated revenue through various bespoke developments and solutions. Our next strategic move is to pivot towards developing a comprehensive
 **AI-driven platform** 
 , further elevating our impact in the brand management sphere.
 



  





 This is a joint-venture with massive growth potential. With the right team, we anticipate scaling to
 **$10M in ARR within the first year of launch** 
 .
 



  





**What We Are Looking For** 




  





 We're seeking one or two driven, tech-savvy, and ambitious
 **Technical Co-founder(s) & AI Engineer(s)** 
 with an opportunity to join as a co-founder(s). You’ll be a core member of the founding team, with significant influence over technology, strategy, and execution — along with meaningful equity upside.
 



  





 As a co-founder, you will have the freedom to push boundaries, dive deep into code, and actively contribute to shaping the company’s vision and technological backbone. You will also be instrumental in building and mentoring a high-performing team to tackle challenges head-on and achieve ambitious growth.
 



  





 This is a challenge for someone with the grit, grind, and determination to build, innovate, and scale
 **Brinna AI** 
 into a global leader in tech-driven brand management solutions.
 



  





**Who We Think You Are** 




  





 🧗‍♂️
 **Founder mentality** 
 — ownership, resourcefulness, and the ability to thrive in ambiguity.
 



 📦
 **Product-first engineering mindset** 
 — focus on delivering customer value over pure technical complexity.
 



 🧠
 **AI/ML expertise** 
 — hands-on experience building and deploying AI/ML models, with a solid understanding of modern architectures, tools, and frameworks (e.g., transformers, LLMs, RAGs, model APIs, graph database technologies, etc.).
 



**💼 Full-stack expertise** 
 — strong experience in frontend & backend development (React, TypeScript, Tailwind, Next.js, PostgreSQL, a plus. Open to other stacks as well based on solid rationales and personal preference).
 



**🗣️ Strong communication and leadership skills** 
 — ability to influence company strategy and mentor future team members.
 



**🚀 Startup experience** 
 — prior work at an early-stage company or high-growth tech startup.
 



**⚡️ Bias for action** 
 — you move fast, make pragmatic trade-offs, and iterate efficiently.
 



  





**Why You Should Join Us** 




  





**🎭 Culture of Innovation and Autonomy:** 
 You’ll have real ownership over your work as well as the success of the platform and the team.
 



**⚒️ Hands-On Impact:** 
 Play a crucial role in the development and refinement of a product desired by the market, with the opportunity to innovate and shape its future.
 



**🤝 Collaborative Environment:** 
 Work with a passionate, forward-thinking team and a well-established creative agency dedicated to disrupting the industry through innovation in a mission-driven environment.
 



**💸 Equity & Ownership:** 
 Receive a substantial equity stake in a high-potential startup, giving you a direct influence on the direction and success of the company.
 



  





**Next Steps** 




  





 Are you ready to take on the technical lead in a rapidly growing startup with enormous potential? Let's talk! 🚀

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
**🚀 Help Build the Future of Legal Tech** 




  





 Imagine a world where legal workflows are intuitive, efficient, and actually enjoyable. We’re making that a reality.
 



  





 Our platform is revolutionizing the way modern teams handle legal, turning what used to be slow, manual, and expensive into a seamless, scalable, and user-friendly experience. From contract creation and collaboration to compliance and insights, we're empowering businesses to take control of their legal work like never before.
 



 This is your chance to help build the technical foundation of a platform that's changing how companies across industries think about legal, from start-ups to global enterprises.
 



  





**The Role: Senior Backend Engineer ⌨️ 🛠️** 




  





 This role is a unique mix of hands-on backend development, infrastructure leadership, and system architecture. You'll design the systems that power mission-critical legal tools and you’ll get to see your work go live, fast.
 



 We're looking for someone who thrives at the intersection of software engineering and infrastructure. Someone who can think in systems, sweat the small stuff, and ship meaningful features with impact.
 



  





**What You’ll Be Doing 🎯💡** 




  




* Architect and build scalable, secure, and high-performing backend systems
* Drive technical strategy and help make decisions that shape the core platform
* Lead infrastructure development and optimize performance, reliability, and cost
* Work cross-functionally with engineers, product managers, and stakeholders
* Contribute across the stack, from backend services to DevOps to API design
* Blend long-term thinking with hands-on execution to bring bold ideas to life



  





**What We’re Looking For 🧠🔍** 




  




* A builder mindset with a track record of solving hard engineering problems
* Deep experience designing and maintaining cloud-native systems (AWS preferred)
* Strong knowledge of microservices, event-driven architecture, and system design
* Advanced skills in TypeScript/Node.js, with real-world experience using PostgreSQL and GraphQL
* Mastery of Docker, Kubernetes, and orchestration best practices
* Understanding of performance tuning, observability, and production-grade DevOps
* Bonus: Experience working with LLMs or building AI/ML infrastructure
* A collaborative, can-do attitude with strong communication and problem-solving skills



  





**Our Tech Stack 🧰** 




  




* Backend: Node.js, TypeScript
* Frontend: React, TypeScript
* Database: PostgreSQL
* API: GraphQL
* Infrastructure: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS
* Architecture: Microservices



  





**Why You’ll Love Working Here ♥️** 




  




* Be part of a team transforming an entire industry with modern tech
* Work in a product-led, engineering-driven environment
* Have real ownership of what you build from concept to deploy
* Collaborate with kind, driven teammates who back each other up
* Enjoy a fast-paced, high-growth company with strong values and a clear mission
* Competitive compensation, benefits, and room to grow



  





 If you're ready to help reshape the legal industry and build the backend systems powering that change, we’d love to meet you.
 



 Let’s create something extraordinary together!

title: Principal Engineer – New Power System Solutions Planning
description:
**Principal Engineer – New Power System Solutions Planning** 




**Location: Nuremburg or Stockholm** 




  





**Our Client** 




 Our client specializes in advanced technologies for intelligent energy systems. With over a decade of expertise in energy research and development, the company has built strong capabilities across areas such as innovative power converter topologies, advanced power semiconductor applications and reliability, control algorithms, and system-level architecture for digital power solutions.
 



  





 The company operates as part of a global technology organization that combines power electronics and digital technologies including energy storage, thermal management, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence to accelerate innovation in the energy sector. The primary focus is on enabling clean power generation, smart grid integration, green ICT infrastructure, transportation electrification, and intelligent energy ecosystems.
 



  





**Core Research Areas** 



* Power Conversion & Distribution Technologies (e.g., PV, data centers, embedded modules, wireless power transfer)
* Advanced Powertrain Solutions for Electric Vehicles
* Grid Integration and Power Control Algorithms
* Advanced Power Device Packaging & Reliability
* Cooling and Thermal Management Systems
* Energy Storage Systems and Intelligent Energy Management



  





**Position Overview** 




 We are seeking a visionary and technically accomplished Principal Engineer to lead the strategic planning and development of next-generation power system solutions. This role will shape the future of technologies such as BESS, FACTS, HVDC/MVDC, and grid-forming inverters. As a thought leader, you will guide cross-functional innovation initiatives, collaborate with internal and external partners, and contribute to both technology strategy and industry standards development.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 Technology Strategy & Vision
 


* Analyze global power system trends to shape the long-term technical roadmap.
* Define and guide technology platforms and innovation directions across the product portfolio.



 Solution Development & Innovation
 


* Drive the integration of emerging technologies (e.g., BESS, FACTS, grid-forming controls) into advanced power system architectures.
* Translate customer challenges into scalable, future-proof solutions that lead the market.
* Support joint-innovation programs with key partners and cross-functional teams.



 System Studies & Prototyping
 


* Conduct simulations, grid impact analyses, and power system studies.
* Lead or support lab and field validation of new technologies and control strategies.



 Industry Leadership & Collaboration
 


* Actively participate in technical working groups, consortia, and standardization bodies.
* Represent the organization as a technical leader, influencing industry direction and standards.



  





**Required Qualifications & Experience** 




 Expertise in Power Systems
 


* Deep technical knowledge in power system platforms, including BESS, FACTS, HVDC, MVDC, and renewable integration.
* Strong background in system architecture and control strategies for grid-connected and grid-forming inverters.



 Innovation & Product Strategy
 


* Proven experience transforming advanced technologies into market-ready solutions.
* Familiarity with grid simulation tools, virtual power plant architectures, and control systems for renewable energy sources.



 Cross-Functional & Industry Insight
 


* Strategic thinker with multi-domain awareness (technology, customer needs, industry trends).
* Hands-on experience in co-developing solutions with engineering, R&D, and customer-facing teams.



 Track Record of Impact
 


* Demonstrated ability to lead projects from concept to implementation.
* Experience influencing executive-level decisions with technical recommendations.



 Preferred Expertise
 


* Experience with power electronics and control systems for inverter-based resources.
* Familiarity with electric vehicle infrastructure, advanced energy storage systems, or distributed energy resources.



  





**Core Competencies** 



* Analytical and forward-thinking mindset with the ability to connect technology with business value
* High degree of initiative, creativity, and problem-solving ability
* Strong collaboration, communication, and presentation skills
* Structured, detail-oriented approach to complex problem solving
* Fluent in written and spoken English

title: Storage Solutions Engineer
description:
As part of our growing Energy Storage team, we are now looking for a
 **Storage Optimization Engineer** 
 to optimize our battery storage projects, both standalone and hybrid, for long-term value and performance.
 



  





**About the role** 




 You will work at the intersection of technology and commercial strategy, ensuring our storage projects are technically sound and financially optimized. This role involves close collaboration across OX2’s functions including Investments, Power Markets, Procurement, and Development.
 



  





**Key responsibilities:** 



* Optimize storage system design considering both technical and commercial aspects
* Support project sizing, augmentation strategies, and hybrid system design
* Identify and solve grid-related and market-driven design challenges
* Bridge technical design with market and revenue modelling
* Contribute to due diligence and investment analysis
* Develop tools and documentation to support decision-making and knowledge sharing



  





**About you** 




 We’re looking for someone structured, analytical, and collaborative, with a passion for energy innovation. You likely have:
 



  




* A degree in Engineering, Economics, or a related field
* 3+ years of experience in energy storage or renewable energy
* Solid understanding of both technical systems and market dynamics
* Strong communication skills and fluency in English. Additional languages such as Swedish, Finnish, Italian or Polish are a plus
* Experience working cross-functionally in international teams
* A proactive, solution-oriented mindset



  





**Location & travel** 




 The role is based in
 **Stockholm** 
 or another OX2 office, occasional
 **travel up to 15%** 
 may be required.
 



  





**About OX2** 




 OX2 develops, constructs, sells, owns, and operates renewable energy solutions at scale. OX2’s project development portfolio consists of in-house development as well as acquired projects in onshore and offshore wind, solar, and energy storage, in various phases of development. OX2 operates across Europe and in Australia. The company has about 500 employees and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden. OX2 is owned by EQT, one of the world’s largest private equity investors. www.ox2.com

title: Backend Engineer II, Trust & Safety
description:
Spotify’s Trust & Safety team is seeking a mid-level to experienced Backend Engineer to play a pivotal role in creating and evolving the core infrastructure that empowers our specialists to identify, review, and take action on harmful or inappropriate content across the platform. In this position, you will design and implement robust backend solutions that enhance the accuracy, speed, and efficiency of our Trust & Safety operations. This includes developing flexible, high-performing systems to process and surface critical data, enabling seamless collaboration between internal teams and third-party integrations. Your work will directly contribute to maintaining a safe and trustworthy experience for Spotify's global user base.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Deliver high-impact and high-visibility products with the fast-paced style of a startup, supported by the resources of a global company
* Develop APIs and integrations with third party integrations and SaaS partners to surface critical data for Trust & Safety specialists, enabling efficient decision-making and actions.
* Collaborate with T&S operational teams to deliver compliant, secure, and trustworthy tooling supported by robust data tracking pipelines.
* Productionize intelligent workflows with T&S data scientists, including automating complex decision-making processes and surfacing ML-based leads for future review.
* Promote and implement SRE methodologies, enabling smooth deployments, monitoring and short feedback loops to resolve incidents.


 Who You Are
   

  

* BS/MS in CS or other relevant fields of study with 4+ years of relevant experience post-bachelors graduation or 2+ years post-masters graduation
* You are proficient in Java, Python and/or Scala, with a willingness to pick up other programming languages.
* You have experience with SaaS infrastructure, cloud-based environments, Kubernetes and Docker environments
* You have a passion for learning, experimenting, scaling and working with new technologies, while adapting quickly
* You have experience working within distributed systems and have designed highly-scalable systems across various projects, platforms, or portals
* You are comfortable designing tooling in ambiguous environments and working collaboratively with multi-functional teams to nail down deliverable requirements
* You are excited about solving very loosely defined problems and thrive when working on a team that has autonomy in their day-to-day decisions


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best!
* For this role, you can be within the EMEA region as long as we have a work location (excluding France due to on-call restrictions) .This team operates within the Central European and GMT time zone for collaboration.


 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
*Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Vårt största fokus är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar att få leva din passion tillsammans med oss. Var du kommer ifrån är inte relevant - det är vart du är på väg som är intressant för oss. Precis som vi igår inte kunde drömma om det Fortnox som finns idag, så kan du vara med och forma vilka vi är imorgon.*
**Om tjänsten**
 Vi blickar mot en framtid där allt förväntas förändras, särskilt vår interaktion med den digitala världen. På Fortnox utvecklar vi nu den plattform för machine learning som kommer att bilda grund för våra framtida produkter. Med digitala "agenter" i olika former som stöttepelare, möjliggör denna teknik att vi sänker barriären för att driva företag och effektiviserar daglig administration. Arbetet är redan i full gång och vår vision är knivskarp. Du kommer att bli en central figur inom ett av våra etablerade team. För närvarande navigerar teamet genom en mängd spännande utmaningar – alltifrån verktyg och arkitektur till klassificering och generativ AI, allt kretsande kring stora språkmodeller.
   

  

**Om dig**
 Nu söker vi dig som är
 **Machine Learning Engineer** 
 och har flerårig erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling i produktteam. Du har en bred kompetens från klient till server och arkitektur. Genom antingen formell utbildning eller hands-on erfarenhet har du sedan rört dig mot machine learning. Du har relevant erfarenhet inom Python, ML-ramverk som Pytorch eller TensorFlow samt SQL / RDBMs och meriterande erfarenhet från Huggingface, Kubernetes, mlflow, dvc eller motsvarande verktyg.
   

  

 Vidare tror vi att du bemästrar hela processen för en modell, från insamling av data till träning och optimering samt utvärdering. Du känner till de senaste teknikerna och verktygen för att skapa och implementera modeller och du är driven för att fortsätta att lära dig nya saker inom området.
   

  

 För denna roll värdesätter vi djup teknisk kunskap. En del av rekryteringsprocessen involverar därför tekniska intervjuer kretsande kring machine learning, systemarkitektur, och programmeringstester i python.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Vi erbjuder en central position inom en snabbt växande och välmående organisation. Du får stor frihet att påverka innehållet i din roll, där ditt eget bidrag kommer att ha stor inverkan på företagets resultat. Du kommer få delta i Fortnox strävan att skapa ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand.
   

  

 Hos oss kommer du att få möjlighet att arbeta på spännande projekt som utmanar dina färdigheter och utvecklar din karriär. Sök nu och var med och skapa framtiden.
   

  

**Om Fortnox**
*Fortnox AB (publ) är en företagsplattform som knyter samman människor, företag och organisationer. Vi hjälper företag starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska produkter, lösningar och tjänster, och möjlighet att koppla ihop dem med hundratals externa parter, är vi ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vår vision är att skapa ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag. Fortnox grundades 2001 och har huvudkontor i Växjö samt kontor i Malmö, Linköping och Stockholm. Aktien är noterad på Nasdaq Stockholm. För ytterligare information se* 
*www.fortnox.se* 
*.*
**Välkommen med din ansökan!**

title: Senior Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Bygga interna admin- och supportverktyg
* Driva initiativ kring produktivitet, kommunikation och teamflöden
* Skapa tydliga, skalbara strukturer i verktyg som Notion, Slack, Linear m.fl.
* Vara ett kommunikationsnav för en snabbt växande tech-avdelning


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* En duktig fullstackutvecklare
* Kommunikativ, självgående och initiativtagande
* Nyfiken på hur verktyg, struktur och processer kan driva produktivitet
* Van att ta ansvar och få saker i mål
* Jobbat med interna admin system
* Har drivit en startup, side project eller liknande initiativ – eller trivs i entreprenöriella miljöer
* Djup kunskap inom AI Engineering är väldigt meriterande.


**Teknikstack:**
* React
* Node.js
* AWS


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 19-06-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Vill du ta din expertis inom data engineering till nästa nivå? Brinner du för att skapa värde genom data och AI? Då är det här rollen för dig!
   

  

 HiQ växer inom AI, data och cloud – och vi letar nu efter en Data Engineer som både vill utveckla våra kunders lösningar och vara med och driva vår egen AI-affär framåt.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Data Engineer på HiQ kommer du bland annat att:
   

  

* Bygga och implementera skalbara dataplattformar i molnet, från ingestion via ETL/ELT till realtidsanalys och AI-integration
* Designa och optimera datamodeller och dataflöden, inklusive streaming-teknologier som Apache Kafka eller motsvarande
* Implementera robusta CI/CD-processer och gärna arbeta med Infrastructure as Code


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av data engineering och molnbaserade dataplattformar
* Erfarenhet av Cloud-lösningar (Azure, AWS och/eller GCP)
* Goda kunskaper i Python och SQL för att hantera och optimera dataflöden
* Civilingenjörsexamen eller motsvarande relevant utbildning
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


 Det är meriterande om du även har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av Databricks, Snowflake eller liknande plattformar
* Erfarenhet av AI/ML-workflows
* Förmåga att designa dataarkitektur och göra tekniska vägval i komplexa miljöer
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med ETL/ELT-verktyg och ramverk (ex. Airflow, dbt, Talend)
* Vana av att sätta upp och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines för data- och molnprojekt


 Vi tror att du är en person som älskar att både bygga teknik och skapa värde för kunder. Du gillar att vara rådgivande, dela med dig av din expertis och har en naturlig förmåga att driva projekt framåt.
   

  

**Varför HiQ?**
* Innovativa projekt där vi jobbar med några av Nordens mest spännande företag inom tech, AI och digital transformation
* Passion för teknik och människor – hos oss står relationer, samarbete och utveckling i fokus
* Frihet och ansvar – vi tror på självledarskap och ger dig utrymme att påverka
* Gemenskap och kultur där vi har kul tillsammans, både på och utanför jobbet


**Redo att ta nästa steg?**
 Skicka in din ansökan idag! Urval och intervjuer sker löpande, så vänta inte för länge – tjänsten kan tillsättas innan
 **sista ansökningsdatum 15 juni** 
 .
   

  

 Har du frågor? Hör av dig till oss – vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig och tillsammans forma framtidens AI-drivna datalösningar.

 Skicka in din ansökan idag! Urval och intervjuer sker löpande, så vänta inte för länge – tjänsten kan tillsättas innan
